author: Digital Foundry
description:
Digital Foundry is now fully independent! Join the DF Supporter Program and support the team: https://bit.ly/3jEGjvx

So we weren't expecting this! Kirby Air Riders for Nintendo Switch 2 flew under our radar, but it turns out that the game is extremely compelling, with a wealth of content and interesting ideas. It's also based on a brand new engine, with much to discuss. John and Oliver sit down to discuss this new release - in extended depth!

Visit the new Digital Foundry website: https://www.digitalfoundry.net

Go here to check out DF merch! https://store.digitalfoundry.net

Subscribe for more Digital Foundry: http://bit.ly/DFSubscribe

00:00 Introduction
01:55 Action and feel
04:50 Tracks and lighting
11:28 Engine technology
19:18 City Trial
23:35 Road Trip
26:57 Top Ride
28:45 Image quality and resolution
32:29 HDR: oddly poor
35:39 Performance and split-screen
38:20 Concluding thoughts
title: Kirby Air Riders Switch 2 Review - New Engine Tech... And A Great Game!
